name: Remake of my First FPS Game
name_original: Remake of my First FPS Game
description:
Install instructions

To install the game:

1.Download Winrar

2.Install Winrar

3.Right click the rar file

4.Click Extract files...

5.Choose a directory to where the game is gonna be extracted

6.Click Ok

7.Go to the location where you extracted your file

8.Open the folder

9.Open REMAKE MY FPS

10.Enjoy
